name: Dino Train Match Up Game
description:
Toot! Roar! Do you have a little train lover that also digs dinosaurs? Then chug-a-chug-a-choo-choo back into a jurassic world for some rootin' tootin’ dino fun in the dinosaur train games matchup race! Your little conductor will have a dino-rrific time playing with dinosaurs aboard trains in this cute and cool timed matching game.

The dino train games free is a timed three round matching game, featuring 12 different dinosaurs in trains and a dinosaur egg too. The first round is 120 seconds and each after that is 10 seconds less, so your little one can improve and get faster each round.

Another fantastic feature to the Dino Train Game that makes it even more fun then just matching- your little conductor must find the icons that link for their match choices! And when they do make a linked match the dino train kids game shows them the link. This important element, and the matching itself, provides a real educational bonus and playing also promotes:
- Fine motor skills.
- Memory and recognition skills.
- Hand eye coordination.
- Early math concepts.
- Color recognition

More features:
- 2 player versus mode
- 4 different type of match board table with 48 items (gems, fruits, dinos and animals)
- Race mode with train timer
- Relax mode

And to add even more fun to the train kid games … a real train sound! When your little one starts the game they will hear a train engine sound AND a train horn toot! Then happy dappy music will play throughout the train game free for toddlers to keep them hoppin and boppin’.
Click matching icons to clear them from the board before time's up. You must pick matching pairs that are the same. When you find a match pairs will disappear.
Hop on board the fun train and go back in time to have a blast playing with dinosaurs in the dinosaur train games Match up race!
